pullrequest.title: Require DART 4.1 and fix deprecation warnings

content.raw: DART package was built with `None` (not `Release` or `RelWithDebInfo`) build type so it was compiled without any optimization. The upgraded dart package was built with `RelWithDebInfo` as @_jrivero_ [recommended](https://github.com/dartsim/dart/pull/219). The upgraded dart package, however, is temporary. I am planning to upgrade to DART 4.1.1 with some fixes soon.
content.html: DART package was built with None (not Release or RelWithDebInfo) build type so it was compiled without any optimization. The upgraded dart package was built with RelWithDebInfo as @jrivero recommended. The upgraded dart package, however, is temporary. I am planning to upgrade to DART 4.1.1 with some fixes soon.
